Services.title: WHAT SERVICES DO WE OFFER?
Services.description1: At World Wide Travel, we offer comfortable and safe trips from Chișinău to your favorite destinations in Europe. Our modern minibuses and buses are equipped to ensure you have a relaxing journey. Our experienced drivers will get you to your destination safely and on time.
Services.description2: With our parcel delivery service, you can send packages quickly and safely from Chișinău to cities in Austria, Germany, France, and Switzerland. We ensure prompt delivery and treat each parcel with care and attention.
Services.parcelInfoText1: For larger parcels, the rate is calculated per unit. Please contact our office or visit us in person to determine the rate.
Services.parcelInfoText2: Collection and delivery of parcels are carried out throughout the territory of the Republic of Moldova and Switzerland. Depending on the needs, transportation can be done in refrigerated chambers.

Features.title: WHY OUR TEAM?
Features.featuresBoldText: At World Wide Travel, we are dedicated to providing you with high-quality passenger and parcel transportation services, with regular departures from Chișinău.
Features.featuresCheckText_1_Description: We ensure that every trip is safe and comfortable for you.
Features.featuresCheckText_2_Description: Our drivers are experienced and dedicated to providing you with the best service.
Features.featuresCheckText_3_Description: We offer high-quality services at competitive prices.

Footer.footerInfo: For more information about our services or to make a reservation, please do not hesitate to contact us.
Footer.copyright: Copyright © World Wide Travel all rights reserved.

AboutHeader.headerDesc: Every journey is a unique experience, filled with comfort and safety, with destinations in Germany, Switzerland, France, and Austria.

AboutPage_About.title: WHO ARE WE?
AboutPage_About.AboutBoldText: We are World Wide Travel, an international passenger and parcel transport company based in Chișinău.
AboutPage_About.AboutParagraph_1: With over 10 years of experience, we are dedicated to providing high-quality services, ensuring safe and comfortable journeys for all our passengers.
AboutPage_About.AboutParagraph_2: We take pride in our modern fleet of buses and our professional team that ensures you reach your destination in the best conditions. We specifically cater to elderly individuals, offering them all the support they need for a worry-free journey.

AboutFeatures.title: WHY OUR TEAM?
AboutFeatures.featureCard_1_Description: We ensure that every trip is safe and comfortable for you.
AboutFeatures.featureCard_2_Description: Our drivers are experienced and dedicated to providing you with the best service.
AboutFeatures.featureCard_3_Description: We offer high-quality services at competitive prices.
AboutFeatures.featureCard_4_Description: We adhere to departure and arrival times, ensuring you arrive on time.
AboutFeatures.featureCard_5_Description: We continually invest in improving service quality.
AboutFeatures.featureCard_6_Description: We provide all the necessary information for a trip with no surprises.

AboutPage_Testimonials.title: WHAT DO CLIENTS SAY?
AboutPage_Testimonials.test_1_text: I have traveled several times with World Wide Travel and I am always impressed by the comfort and safety provided. I highly recommend it!
AboutPage_Testimonials.test_2_text: I have had the opportunity to travel a few times with World Wide Travel and I can say that their services are impeccable.
AboutPage_Testimonials.test_3_text: The buses are modern and clean, and the trips are very pleasant. Thank you for the excellent services!
AboutPage_Testimonials.test_4_text: Everything was perfect from booking to arrival. A team of true professionals, I highly recommend!

LogInModal.message: We're excited to have you back. Please enter your email address and password
LogInModal.question: Don't have an account?
LogInModal.fields-req-desc: Please enter both your email address and password.
LogInModal.login-fail-desc: The email or password you entered is incorrect. Please try again.

SignUpModal.question: Already have an account?

SignUpModal.lastname-req-desc: Please enter your last name to continue.
SignUpModal.firstname-req-desc: Please enter your first name to continue.
SignUpModal.firstname-err-desc: First name must be at least 1 character and no more than 50 characters.
SignUpModal.lastname-err-desc: Last name must be at least 1 character and no more than 50 characters.
SignUpModal.email-err-desc: Email must be at least 1 character and no more than 50 characters, and must be a valid email address.
SignUpModal.email-taken-desc: This email has already been used for registration. Please use a different email.
SignUpModal.general-error-desc: An error occurred during the registration process. Please try again later.

ResetPassModal.title: Reset Password
ResetPassModal.message: Please enter the email address you used when creating your account.
ResetPassModal.email-req-desc: Please enter your email address to proceed.
ResetPassModal.email-err-desc: The email must be at least 1 character long, no more than 50 characters, and must be a valid email address.
ResetPassModal.message2: We will send you an email with a verification link.
ResetPassModal.general-error-desc: An error occurred while sending the password reset link. Please try again later.

EmailSentModal.title: Check Your Email
EmailSentModal.message: We have sent a verification link to your email address
EmailSentModal.message2: Click the link to complete the verification. This link will expire in 24 hours

SignUpEmailSentModal.title: Account Created Successfully
SignUpEmailSentModal.message1: We have sent the account details to
SignUpEmailSentModal.message2: Please check your email to find the account details.

UserModal.lastname-err-desc: Last name must be at least 1 character and no more than 50 characters.
UserModal.date-err-desc: The date must be in the format day, month, year and be a valid date.

UserModal.update-success-desc: Account details have been successfully updated.

UserModal.no-reservations: Currently, there are no reservations associated with this account.
